hindi: पाण्डव और कौरव-सेनाके मुख्य-मुख्य महारथियोंके नामोंका वर्णन
english: Description of the names of the chief great charioteers of the Pandava and the Kaurava army

hindi: दोनों पक्षोंकी सेनाओंके शंखवादनका वर्णन
english: Description of the sound of conchs of the two armies

hindi: अर्जुनके द्वारा सेना-निरीक्षण
english: Survey of the anny by Arjuna

hindi: अर्जुनके द्वारा कायरता, शोक और पश्चात्तापयुक्त वचन कहना तथा संजयद्वारा शोकाविष्ट अर्जुनकी अवस्थाका वर्णन
english: Arjuna is filled with deep sorrow and unmanliness; he recounts the evil consequences of the destruction of the race and family traditions and Safijaya describes Arjuna's condition that he is overwhelmed with grief

hindi: अर्जुनकी कायरताके विषयमें संजय-द्वारा भगवान् श्रीकृष्ण और अर्जुनके संवादका वर्णन
english: Sanjaya describes the dialogue between Lord Krishna and Arjuna, mentioning Arjuna's sorrow and unmanliness

hindi: सांख्ययोगका वर्णन
english: Description of Samkhya Yoga (Discipline of Knowledge)

hindi: क्षात्रधर्मकी दृष्टिसे युद्ध करनेकी आवश्यकताका प्रतिपादन
english: Propriety of fighting a righteous war for a Kshatriya (member of the warrior class)

hindi: कर्मयोगका वर्णन
english: Description of the Discipline of Action

hindi: स्थितप्रज्ञके लक्षणों आदिका वर्णन
english: Description of the marks etc., of the stable in mind

hindi: सांख्ययोग और कर्मयोगकी दृष्टिसे कर्तव्य-कर्म करनेकी आवश्यकता का निरूपण
english: Necessity of the performance of duty, being free from attachment from the view-point of the Discipline of Knowledge and Action

hindi: यज्ञ और सृष्टिचक्रकी परम्परा सुरक्षित रखनेके लिये कर्तव्य-कर्म करनेकी आवश्यकताका निरूपण
english: Necessity of the performance ofduty for the sake of sacrifice and for maintaining the tradition of the cycle of creation

hindi: लोकसंग्रहके लिये कर्तव्य-कर्म करनेकी आवश्यकताका निरूपण
english: Necessity of the performance of duty to set examples for others

hindi: राग-द्वेषरहित होकर स्वधर्मके अनुसार कर्तव्य-कर्म करनेकी प्रेरणा
english: Inspiration for the performance of one's own duty, beingfreefrom attachment andaversion

hindi: पापोंके कारणभूत 'काम’ को मारनेकी प्रेरणा
english: Inspiration to kill desire, the root of sins

hindi: कर्मयोगकी परम्परा और भगवान्के जन्मों तथा कर्मोंकी दिव्यताका वर्णन
english: Tradition of the Discipline of Action and divine character of births and actions of God

hindi: कर्मोंके तत्त्वका और तदनुसार यज्ञोंका वर्णन
english: Description about the reality of actions and different forms of sacrifices

hindi: ज्ञानयोग और कर्मयोगकी प्रशंसा तथा प्रेरणा
english: Glory of the Disciplines of Knowledge and Action and inspiration to follow them

hindi: सांख्ययोग तथा कर्मयोगकी एकताका प्रतिपादन और कर्मयोगकी प्रशंसा
english: Identity of the Disciplines of Knowledge and Action and glory of the Discipline of Action

hindi: सांख्ययोग और कर्मयोगके साधनका प्रकार
english: Description of the Disciplines of Action and Knowledge

hindi: फलसहित सांख्ययोगका विषय
english: The Discipline of Knowledge with its fruit

hindi: ध्यान और भक्तिका वर्णन
english: Description of Meditation and Devotion

hindi: कर्मयोगका विषय और योगारूढ़ मनुष्यके लक्षण
english: The Discipline of Action and marks of the man who has attained to Yoga (equanimity)

hindi: आत्मोद्धारके लिये प्रेरणा और सिद्ध कर्मयोगीके लक्षण
english: Inspiration for redeeming the self; and the marks of the God-realized soul

hindi: आसनकी विधि और फलसहित सगुण-साकारके ध्यानका वर्णन
english: Description of posture and meditation on God (with attributes and form) with its fruits

hindi: नियमोंका और फलसहित स्वरूपके ध्यानका वर्णन
english: Description of rules and meditation on God with its fruit

hindi: फलसहित निर्गुण-निराकारके ध्यानका वर्णन
english: Description of meditation on God who is attributeless and formless with its fruit

hindi: सगुण और निर्गुणके ध्यान-योगियोंका अनुभव
english: Experience of those who meditate on God Who is endowed with attributes and Who is attributeless

hindi: मनके निग्रहका विषय
english: Subject of mind-control

hindi: योगभ्रष्टकी गतिका वर्णन और भक्ति-योगीकी महिमा
english: Destiny of the man who has fallen from Yoga; and glory of the man of exclusive devotion

hindi: भगवान्के द्वारा समग्ररूपके वर्णनकी प्रतिज्ञा करना तथा अपरा-परा प्रकृतियोंके संयोगसे प्राणियोंकी उत्पत्ति बताकर अपनेको सबका मूल कारण बताना
english: The Lord promises to describe His integral being and explains that all beings are born by the union of the two-higher and lower Natures while He is the root cause of all of them

hindi: कारणरूपसे भगवान्की विभूतियोंका वर्णन
english: God's manifestations in the form of cause

hindi: भगवान्के शरण होनेवालोंका और शरण न होनेवालोंका वर्णन
english: Description of thosewho take refuge in God and those who don't take refuge in Him

hindi: अन्य देवताओंकी उपासनाओंका फलसहित वर्णन
english: Description of the worship of other gods with its fruit

hindi: भगवान्के प्रभावको न जाननेवालों-की निन्दा और जाननेवालोंकी प्रशंसा तथा भगवान्के समग्ररूपका वर्णन
english: Condemnation of those who don't know God's influence and glories and eulogy of His devotees; and description of His integral being

hindi: अर्जुनके सात प्रश्न और भगवान्के द्वारा उनका उत्तर देते हुए सब समयमें अपना स्मरण करनेकी आज्ञा देना
english: Arjuna puts seven questions, the Lord answers them and exhorts him to think of Him at all times

hindi: सगुण-निराकार, निर्गुण-निराकार और सगुण-साकारकी उपासनाका फलसहित वर्णन
english: Description of worship of God Who is with attributes and formless; attributeless and formless; and with attributes and form with fruit

hindi: ब्रह्मलोकतककी अवधिका और भगवान्की महत्ता तथा भक्तिका वर्णन
english: Description of the duration of cosmic day and night and the glory of God and devotio

hindi: शुक्ल और कृष्ण-गतिका वर्णन और उसको जाननेवाले योगीकी महिमा
english: Description of Bright and Dark paths and glory of the Yogi who knows them

hindi: प्रभावसहित विज्ञानका वर्णन
english: Description of Vijfiana (Realization) with its glory

hindi: महासर्ग और महाप्रलयका वर्णन
english: Description of New Creation and Final Dissolution

hindi: भगवान्का तिरस्कार करनेवाले एवं आसुरी, राक्षसी और मोहिनी प्रकृतिका आश्रय लेनेवालोंका कथन तथा दैवी प्रकृतिका आश्रय लेनेवाले भक्तोंके भजनका वर्णन
english: Condemnation of those who don't know God's glory; mention of those who embrace a demoniac, devilish and deluding nature and description of the worship of those devotees who embrace the divine nature

hindi: कार्य-कारणरूपसे भगवत्स्वरूप विभूतियोंका वर्णन
english: Description of God's glories in the form of effect and cause

hindi: सकाम और निष्काम उपासनाका फलसहित वर्णन
english: Worship with and without an interested motive with fruit

hindi: पदार्थों और क्रियाओंको भगवदर्पण करनेका फल बताकर भक्तिके अधिकारियोंका और भक्तिका वर्णन
english: Offering of objects and actions to God, the fruit of this offering; Description of those who are eligible for devotion and description of devotion

hindi: भगवान्की विभूति और योगका कथन तथा उनको जाननेकी महिमा
english: Mention of the glory and Yoga of the Lord and the reward of knowing them

hindi: फलसहित भगवद्भक्ति और भगवत्कृपाका प्रभाव
english: Devotion to God and its fruit; and the glory of God's grace

hindi: अर्जुनके द्वारा भगवान्की स्तुति और योग तथा विभूतियोंको कहनेके लिये प्रार्थना
english: Arjuna eulogizes the Lord and prays to Him to describe His Yoga and glories

hindi: भगवान्के द्वारा अपनी विभूतियोंका और योगका वर्णन
english: Description of the Lord's glories and Yoga by Him

hindi: विराट्रूप दिखानेके लिये अर्जुनकी प्रार्थना और भगवान्के द्वारा अर्जुनको दिव्यचक्षु प्रदान करना
english: Arjuna requests the Lord to reveal His Cosmic Form; the Lord confers divine vision on him

hindi: संजयद्वारा धृतराष्ट्रके प्रति विराट् रूपका वर्णन
english: Saiijaya describes the Cosmic Form to Dhrtarastra

hindi: अर्जुनके द्वारा विराट्रूपको देखना और उसकी स्तुति करना
english: Arjuna beholds the Cosmic Form and eulogizes it

hindi: भगवान्के द्वारा अपने अत्युग्र विराट्रूपका परिचय और युद्धकी आज्ञा
english: The Lord introduces His most terrible form and orders Arjuna to fight

hindi: अर्जुनके द्वारा विराट्रूप भगवान्की स्तुति-प्रार्थना
english: Arjuna eulogizes the Lord in His Cosmic Form and offers prayer to Him

hindi: भगवान्के द्वारा विराट्रूपके दर्शनकी दुर्लभता बताना और भयभीत अर्जुनको आश्वासन देना
english: The Lord explains that the Cosmic Form is very rare indeed and consoles Arjuna who is terrified

hindi: भगवान्के द्वारा चतुर्भुजरूपकी महत्ता और उसके दर्शनका उपाय बताना
english: The Lord glorifies His four-armed form and the means by which it can be seen

hindi: सगुण और निर्गुण-उपासकोंकी श्रेष्ठताका निर्णय और भगवत्प्राप्तिके चार साधनोंका वर्णन
english: The Lord pronounces His verdict who is superior the worshippers of God with attributes or without attributes; and mentions four spiritual paths which lead to God-realization

hindi: सिद्ध-भक्तोंके उनतालीस लक्षणोंका वर्णन
english: Thirty-nine marks of the devotees who have realized God

hindi: क्षेत्र, क्षेत्रज्ञ (जीवात्मा), ज्ञान और ज्ञेय (परमात्मा)-का भक्ति-सहित विवेचन
english: Discussion of Kshetra (body), Kshetragyna (soul), knowledge and worth-knowing (God) with devotion

hindi: ज्ञानसहित प्रकृति-पुरुषका विवेचन
english: Discussion on Nature and soul

hindi: ज्ञानकी महिमा और प्रकृति-पुरुषसे जगत्की उत्पत्ति
english: Glory of knowledge and emanation of creation from the union of Nature and soul

hindi: सत्त्व, रज और तम-इन तीनों गुणोंका विवेचन
english: Description of the three modes of Nature (of goodness, of passion and of ignorance)

hindi: भगवत्प्राप्तिका उपाय एवं गुणातीत पुरुषके लक्षण
english: Means of God-realization; and marks of the man who has transcended the three modes of Nature

hindi: संसार-वृक्षका तथा उसका छेदन करके भगवान्के शरण होनेका और भगवद्धामका वर्णन
english: Description of the tree of creation; and surrender the self to God, having cut asunder this tree, and the Abode of God

hindi: जीवात्माका स्वरूप तथा उसे जानने-वाले और न जाननेवालेका वर्णन
english: Reality about the soul (self) and description of those who know it and those who don't know it

hindi: भगवान्के प्रभावका वर्णन
english: Description of the glory of God

hindi: क्षर, अक्षर और पुरुषोत्तमका वर्णन तथा अध्यायका उपसंहार
english: Description of Ksara (perishable, the mundane), Aksara, the imperishable (soul) and the Supreme Soul (God) and conclusion of the chapter

hindi: फलसहित दैवी और आसुरी सम्पत्तिका वर्णन
english: Description of divine and demoniac traits with their fruits

hindi: सत्कर्मोंसे विमुख हुए आसुरी-सम्पत्तिवाले मनुष्योंकी मान्यताओं-का कथन
english: Mention of the outlook of the people who embrace the demoniac nature, having a disinclination for virtuous actions

hindi: आसुरी-सम्पत्तिवाले मनुष्योंके दुराचारों और मनोरथोंका फल-सहित वर्णन
english: Impure conduct and ambitions with fruit of the men embracing the demoniac nature

hindi: आसुरी-सम्पत्तिवाले मनुष्योंके दुर्भाव और दुर्गतिका वर्णन
english: Evil nature of the people possessing a demoniac disposition and their evil effect

hindi: आसुरी-सम्पत्तिके मूलभूत दोष-काम, क्रोध और लोभसे रहित होकर शास्त्रविधिके अनुसार कर्म करनेकी प्रेरणा
english: Inspiration to act according to the ordinance of the scriptures, by being free from desire, anger and greed which are the roots of all demoniac traits

hindi: तीन प्रकारकी श्रद्धाका और आसुर निश्चयवाले मनुष्योंका वर्णन
english: Description of three kinds of faith and the people who possess a demoniac nature

hindi: सात्त्विक, राजस और तामस आहारीकी रुचिका वर्णन
english: Description of tastes of food of the three types of persons of the modes of goodness, passion and ignorance

hindi: यज्ञ, तप और दानके तीन-तीन भेदोंका वर्णन
english: Three kinds of sacrifice, austerity and charity

hindi: 'ॐ तत्सत्’के प्रयोगकी व्याख्या और असत्-कर्मका वर्णन
english: Explanation of the sacred appellations Om, Tat and Sat; and description of the 'Asat' (unreal or naught) action

hindi: संन्यास और त्यागके विषयमें मतान्तर और कर्मयोगका वर्णन
english: Description of different views on renunciation; and the Discipline of Action

hindi: सांख्ययोगका वर्णन
english: Description of the Discipline of Knowledge

hindi: कर्मयोगका भक्तिसहित वर्णन
english: Description of the Discipline of Action with devotion

hindi: सांख्ययोगका वर्णन
english: Description of the Discipline of Knowledge

hindi: भगवद्भक्तिका वर्णन
english: Description of devotion to God

hindi: श्रीमद्भगवद्गीताकी महिमा
english: Glory of the Gita
